short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A SIP-based VoIP application that detects phone numbers on active web pages and allows outbound calls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AGEphone Cloud is a cloud-based IP telephony service designed to streamline corporate communications. It offers a flexible solution that combines security and scalability, making it ideal for businesses aiming to enhance their communication infrastructure. By integrating with major IP-PBX systems, AGEphone Cloud eliminates the need for extensive equipment investments. Users can simply install the application on their smartphones, facilitating the adoption of BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) policies and supporting telework environments. This setup enables seamless voice communication, thereby improving team productivity and collaboration. Incorporating AGEphone Cloud into your operations allows for efficient and secure voice communication, essential for the success of telework and digital transformation initiatives.
